Uses of Class
poker.PokerPlayer

    • Uses of PokerPlayer in poker

      Subclasses of PokerPlayer in poker 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AutomatedPokerPlayer
      An subclass of PokerPlayer that forms an AI player capable of deciding its actions with influence of an acquired nature.
      class  HumanPokerPlayer
      An subclass of PokerPlayer that allows for human interaction and user input.
      Fields in poker with type parameters of type PokerPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<PokerPlayer> RoundOfPoker.players 
      java.util.ArrayList<PokerPlayer> GameOfPoker.players 
      Methods in poker that return PokerPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private PokerPlayer RoundOfPoker.getWinner()
      Get the player with the best hand.
      private PokerPlayer GameOfPoker.getWinner()
      Returns a winning PokerPlayer if there is one PokerPlayer left in the GameOfPoker.players list, otherwise returns null.
      private PokerPlayer RoundOfPoker.lastInPlay()
      Gets the last PokerPlayer object that is still an active player.
      PokerPlayer RoundOfPoker.startRound()
      Completes an entire round of poker.
      Methods in poker with parameters of type PokerPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.lang.String RoundOfPoker.getAction(PokerPlayer player, int addedChips, int requiredChips)
      Returns a string describing a player's action using the amount of chips they added to the pot.
